details.description: Get an energy Performance certificate (EPC) - domestic, non-domestic, accreditation, local assessors
details.alternative_title: Get an energy performance certificate for your home
details.more_information:
When you find a local assessor:

 - contact them directly to arrange a viewing
 - check that they're part of an accredited scheme 

For a **business property** search for a [Commercial Energy Assessor.](https://www.ndepcregister.com/searchAssessor.html "search for a Commercial Energy Assessor"){:rel="external"}

If you're unhappy with the assessment you can complain to the assessor directly. If you’re still unhappy, you can contact the assessor’s accreditation scheme. 

Their contact details will be on the energy performance certificate.
details.introduction: To get an energy performance certificate for your home, you to need have your property assessed.  Search for an accredited assessor in your area.
